sub_title: Consultant IT Advisory & Assurance at KPMG  | Data Analyst | Data Science and Society Msc. | Information and Communication Sciences Msc.
summary:
I was born and raised in Vietnam for 15 years before moving to the Netherlands for a new chapter of my life. By experiencing and interacting with different cultures, I have been granted with opportunities to observe and work in diverse groups, which has given me a better understanding that differences in cultures are an essential part in doing business nowadays. If I have a chance to describe myself, I would say I am a motivated, dedicated, hard-working and seeking challenges.

I started with International Schakel Klas, where I mastered the Dutch language in 1 year and got accepted to MAVO 1 instead of basic thanks to my knowledge. Although it was only 3 months that I followed MAVO 1, I received a chance to move directly to the final year, where I successfully passed the final exam. But I keep pursuing my education career by became an MBO student and followed by HBO.

Currently, I am pursuing my pre-master degree in Data Science with a major in Data Science and Society. By involving in different school committee during my bachelor degree, it granted me the opportunity to be critical and innovative. With years of experiences as Crew Trainer/Shift Manager, I developed leadership skill, training/coaching and delegating.

International Business for Asia offered me the opportunity to study and live in China for a half year and executing my internship in Vietnam. It has a significant contribution to the process of my personal developments, also career developments.

My capabilities: Content marketing, Marketing plan, Event Management, Importing and Exporting.

education.field_of_study: Data Science and Society - Business Track

awards.title: Accreditation of the study Trade Management aimed for Asia
awards.description: During the academic year 2017-2018, it was time for an accreditation of the study. This is a process of validation in which the study is evaluated by a peer review board. The quality of the study will be evaluated regarding different subjects such as: falicities, thesis quality, test quality and much more. This accreditation was contributed by teachers, class representatives, program advisory board and students. During this accreditation, I got the opportunity to share my opinion/experiences as a student and class representative. It was a great opportunity to be a part of this event.

awards.title: Best of Employee of the year
awards.description: At the end of the import project, the project group and our tutors selected me as the employee of the year. It was an honor to be chosen and I appreciated very much. It does not only showed that I did my best to achieve my goals, but other people also recognised my hard work.

projects.title: Export project: René Professional
projects.description:
During the third academic year of Trade Management aimed for Asia, four classmates and I wrote an advisory report for René Professional focused on export Pure René product line to Hong Kong. This report consists of an internal analysis to identify the strengths and weaknesses of the company when it comes to export's activities. Different investigations are conducted to identify the most suitable country and strategy for the company. The plan also consists a financial implications part to inform René Professional the possible costs.

Grade: 6,5

contributors.headline: Consultant IT Advisory & Assurance at KPMG  | Data Analyst | Data Science and Society Msc. | Information and Communication Sciences Msc.
Event Management at AHK Greater China
WeChat & Onboarding @ SECRID | Student at Rotterdam School of Management

projects.title: Import project [Winner]
projects.description:
During the second academic year of Trade Management for Asia, Rotterdam Business school required the students to set-up an import company. I worked in a group with nine members named Trends4U Import. We imported an Asian product and launched to the Dutch market. Our group imported SQUEASY, it is durable plastic travel bottle, and the largest size is 89ml. Meaning, it helps traveller never cross the limit ml for the liquid product. We created a demonstration video for SQUEASY. In the end, we ended as the winner of the import project and earned the title ''Best enterprise of the year''. I acquired the award: Employee of the year.

Halfway the project, it was mandatory to change positions within the enterprise, so you were able to develop your skills and knowledge on multiple aspects of entrepreneurship. I challenged myself for the marketing manager position from an all-round employee because I wanted to learn to control leading skill and give other opportunities.

Group grade: 7,3
Individual grade: 7,8

This project consists of two parts. The first part was to analyze the company DSM on its annual reports, including a conclusion and recommendations. The second part was to run a company in a virtual environment. The purpose of this project is to learn how to run a company with all information you have.

projects.title: Marketing an Asian product
projects.description:
The purpose of this project is to write a tactical marketing report for an Indonesian product called Bali Alus Aloe vera hair mask. To write a proper tactical marketing plan, the group conducted market research, including field research.  The tactical marketing plan is to help the company Bali Alus enter the Dutch market with the most suitable marketing strategy by making use of the Unique Selling Point.

Result: 6,9/10

projects.title: Doing Business in Asia
projects.description:
During this project, the project group had to analyze three given countries: India, Taiwan and Malaysia. The purpose of this project is to help medium-sized businesses that wish to expand the business to Asia understand the differences in term of culture. Also, to understand the risks concerning economics, demographic, and politics.

Result: 7,7/10

profile_positions.title: Master Thesis Project IT Assurance and Advisory

profile_positions.description:
During my Data Science and Society at Tilburg University, I noticed the lack of knowledge and gained more interest in the Data world. Therefore, I decided to follow an extra internship alongside with my study at SkyTeam. I am grateful that the company has offered me this opportunity. During this journey, I had been involved in amazing projects and tasks as follows:
 - Updating business dashboards
 - Data and Analyst lead on analysing and reporting Customers' survey
 - Checking Data Quality
 - Co-lead on collecting data and analyzing for the Branding & Commercial department on their marketing strategy
 - Worked iteratively with various business owner to achieve higher quality dashboards
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst

profile_positions.description: As a member of this committee, I am one of the representatives of the students at Rotterdam Business School, especially International Business for Asia (Former Trade Management for Asia). Together with other students and teachers, we are working together to improve our study and create the best for the current students.
profile_positions.title: Member of Programme Advisory Committee

profile_positions.description: My main task as a class representative has become a linking-pin between teachers and students. When the students experience difficulties regarding the quality of test, classes or communication from the teachers, I will make sure that the teacher is aware of the situation. Also, the course director will be informed as well during the evaluation session at the end of each block. In a way, I am also contributing to the developments of the study by sharing experiences or issues with the teachers/course director.
profile_positions.title: Class representative

profile_positions.description: Teaching SPSS, Meso-economies, Finance, Project Management, Market Research, Management & Organisation
profile_positions.title: Peer coach

profile_positions.description: Was also a member of the POO, which is a team of employees, who are responsible for organising employee's activities throughout the year.
profile_positions.title: Shiftmanager

profile_positions.description:
I wrote a business plan focusing on identify the suitable market for Fuente's product. This research included desk research as well as the interview with relevant market leaders/experts to gain valuable insights. 

The advisory report I developed included the following elements: 
- An analysis of the current internal situation, including evaluation and recommendation. 
- A review of all potential Asian country; however, Philippines, South-Korea and Vietnam were the most potential and deciding upon the final export destination - Vietnam. 
- An in-depth analysis of the Vietnamese haircare market on the Marco and Meso environment. 
- Mapped out the potential strategic options and analysed the most suitable strategy based on the organisation believes strengths and market's opportunities. 
- Provided strategic advice on the essential elements as follows: entry strategy, sales and marketing strategy, logistics and financial strategy, organisational and cross-cultural management strategies. 
- Through the field research, I was able to set-up a list with potential distributors and hair salons, which Fuente International will be able to contact in the future. 
I was graded with a 7,9 for my thesis, which is considered as the top 5% of the graduated students in academic year 2019/2020.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Intern

company.name: The Kingdom of the Netherlands in Vietnam

profile_positions.company: The Kingdom of the Netherlands in Vietnam
profile_positions.description:
During my internship in 2018, I was working closely with the economics affairs team of the Consulate General of Kingdom of The Netherlands to coordinate/support different events. Together with the team, I organized various events in 2018 in related to the celebration of 45 years the diplomatic relationship between the Netherlands - Vietnam. 

Besides coordinating/supporting events, I was also responsible for designing posters, agenda, program's books and more. By having the skill of understanding Dutch, Vietnamese and English, translation and conducted market research were also a part of my responsibilities.

Supporting the following projects:
-Vietwater 2018 
-Orange ASEAN Factory in Ho Chi Minh City
-Business Gathering networking events monthly 
-Rethink Plastic together with DBAV
-FoodExpo 
-Various Seminars
profile_positions.title: Project Assistant

profile_positions.description:
I was in charge for training staff including instructing and motivating crew, serving customers, keeping the restaurant clean and organized, preparing food, making sure that food safety rules are followed, and monitoring employee performance. 

The position offers an opportunity to develop specific skills as follows: 
-Leadership by delegating tasks to crew members and assisting the floor managers. 
-Teamwork by assisting the floor managers in arranging tasks and keeping everything organized for the managers. 
-Evaluating and reporting skill by assessing the work of the crew members and report to the manager. 
-Communication by becoming the linking pin between the management and the crew members.
profile_positions.title: Crew Trainer

volunteer_experiences.role: Supporting The Centre of International Affairs (CoIA) at Dutch Replacement Day in Vietnam
volunteer_experiences.description: My main task is to provide information about Rotterdam Business School to Vietnamese students who are considering and want to study in the Netherlands. I was supporting the CoiA team during the Dutch Placement Day, which is organized by the Netherlands Education Support Office (NESO) in 2017 and 2018 in Vietnam.

Sinds the COVID-19 outbreak in the Netherlands. I am working together with a small group of Vietnamese to produce facemasks and sell it for a small price; we made 1Euro profit each mask. We will use the profit to support eight children in Vietnam in their education prospects throughout the year. 

I am mainly responsible for selling the product the Dutch people and keep ook sales records for the balance sheet.
